segments.text: Look at those kids going for the cookies; it's adorable!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's all stretched out on that stool, determined as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar, the other holding a plate like a pro thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, eyes wide, ready to catch her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up so cutely, without mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even with the sink overflowing, it's kind of funny how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out, making a puddle, but hey, adds to the excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate with such care, like it's the only thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in that nice daylight, brightening the whole scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside looks inviting; maybe they'll play there later with their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief just warms my heart; childhood at its best.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ignore the wobbly stool; it's all part of the fun, right?
segments.speaker: PAR
